text: Vayres is a commune. It is found in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region in the Gironde department in the southwest of France. It has a church, 2 bakers and a castle. == History == People have lived in Vayres since ancient history. It was on the roman road from Bordeaux to PÃ©rigueux. Vayres is in a place where two rivers met, which made Vayres important. ==References== Category:Communes in Gironde
title: Vayres, Gironde
